channel.title: Cheats on Pavan bhat
channel.description: Recent content in Cheats on Pavan bhat

item.title: Linux Commands
item.description: Battery status Link to heading cat /sys/class/power_supply/BAT0/status acpid sudo bat -t <limit_range> File Operations Link to heading du -chd 1 | sort -h ls -l Burn ISO Link to heading dd bs=4M if=/path/to/archlinux.iso of=/dev/sdx status=progress && sync
